info.name: Picarto Skinny
info.description:
Neatly rearranges Picarto to be skinny and vertical, instead of wide.
Perfect for multitasking while watching. Also removes premium ads.
info.additionalInfo:
THIS USERSTYLE IS DEPRECATED

UPDATES:
MAR 07: Added optional, commented out, code that hides premium user icons and custom gifs in chat.
MAR 07: Left-aligned nav to fit better with the thin layout.
MAR 08: Left-aligned nav works when logged out too.
